Operation 'playintegrity.deviceRecall.write' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original description lacks a summary entirely and provides minimal context about inputs, outputs, and side effects. Enhanced version clarifies what recall bits are used for, specifies required inputs (package name and request body), explains the response, documents the EAP restriction, and importantly notes that written bits persist and affect future integrity assessments. This helps AI agents understand when to use this operation and what to expect.

data.current_description: Writes recall bits for the device where Play Integrity API token is obtained. The endpoint is available to select Play partners in an early access program (EAP).
data.summary_suggestion: Write device recall bits for integrity verification
data.description_suggestion: Writes recall bits to the device where the Play Integrity API token was generated. This operation allows developers to set custom recall flags for device tracking and integrity assessment. Requires the package name and WriteDeviceRecallRequest containing the recall bit values to write. Returns a WriteDeviceRecallResponse confirming the write operation. Note: This endpoint is available only to select Play partners in the early access program (EAP). The recall bits persist on the device and affect subsequent integrity token evaluations.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks a summary entirely and provides minimal context about inputs, outputs, and side effects. Enhanced version clarifies what recall bits are used for, specifies required inputs (package name and request body), explains the response, documents the EAP restriction, and importantly notes that written bits persist and affect future integrity assessments. This helps AI agents understand when to use this operation and what to expect.

message: Operation 'playintegrity.decodeIntegrityToken' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_context. Original summary is missing and description is overly terse. Enhanced version adds a summary, clarifies the input structure (DecodeIntegrityTokenRequest), details the response structure and its components (TokenPayloadExternal with specific signal types), and explains the business purpose of the decoded data. This enables AI agents to understand that this operation is essential for extracting actionable integrity signals from tokens and when to invoke it in verification workflows.

data.current_description: Decodes the integrity token and returns the token payload.
data.summary_suggestion: Decode and extract integrity token payload
data.description_suggestion: Decodes a Play Integrity API token and extracts its payload containing integrity signals. Accepts a DecodeIntegrityTokenRequest with the encoded token string. Returns a DecodeIntegrityTokenResponse containing the TokenPayloadExternal with app integrity information, device attestation details, account information, and device attributes. The decoded payload includes signals about app authenticity, device integrity, licensing status, and recent device activity to help distinguish genuine from non-genuine user traffic.
data.reasoning: Original summary is missing and description is overly terse. This enables AI agents to understand that this operation is essential for extracting actionable integrity signals from tokens and when to invoke it in verification workflows.
